title: Rhubarb Orange Muffins
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '175ml (6 fl oz) orange juice', '1 dessertspoon orange zest', '250g (9 oz) plain flour', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '150g (5 oz) finely chopped rhubarb']
